se.kth.iv1350.registersystem.model

Class Register

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.kth.iv1350.registersystem.model.Register

  • public class Register
extends java.lang.Object
    Register or cashiers system handling required sale related tasks.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Register()
      Creates a new Register instance combined with a new instance of SaleLog.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Register

        public Register()
        Creates a new Register instance combined with a new instance of SaleLog.

    • Method Detail

      • initiateSale

        public void initiateSale()
        Creates a new Sale instance.

      • registerItem

        public SaleDTO registerItem(int quantity,
                            InventoryDTO inventory)
                     throws ItemQuantityException
        Registers item the attached Sale instance.
        Parameters:
        quantity - The quantity of the item to be registered.
        inventory - The inventory details of the item to be registered.
        Returns:
        An object containing the description and price of the item, as well as the running total of the sale. If quantity is invalid or inventory doesn't exist, returns an object which item description specifies it's invalid.
        Throws:
        ItemQuantityException - once the quantity is invalid, that is once it's less than 1.

      • applyDiscount

        public SaleDTO applyDiscount(CustomerDiscountDTO[] discounts)
        Applies discount, if available, to current sale.
        Parameters:
        discounts - The discounts to be applied.
        Returns:
        An object containing running total, discounted total and discount type.

      • submitPayment

        public SaleDTO submitPayment(double amount)
        Submits payment, and if sufficient, finalizes and logs current sale.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to be paid.
        Returns:
        An object containing the sale details of the receipt. If the sale was not finalized, the amount by which the payment was short.

      • retrieveLog

        public SaleDTO retrieveLog(int index)
        Retrieves receipt for a specified sale that has been logged.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the sale to be retrieved. Logs are stored in chronological order where higher index means older sale.
        Returns:
        The sale details of the receipt. If sale doesn't exist, returns null.

      • retrieveLogCount

        public int retrieveLogCount()
        Retrieves number of logged sales.
        Returns:
        The number of sales that have been logged in the SaleLog.

      • getBalance

        public double getBalance()
        Gets the balance of this register.
        Returns:
        The balance of this Register instance.

      • interpretInput

        public boolean interpretInput(java.lang.String input,
                              java.lang.String pattern)
        Interprets if the input data matches the given pattern.
        Parameters:
        input - The input to be tested.
        pattern - The string or pattern to test the input against.
        Returns:
        A boolean true if matches, false otherwise.

      • attachObserver

        public void attachObserver(SaleObserver observer)
        Attach an observer to the list of observers to be updated after a sale has been finalized.
        Parameters:
        observer - the observed to be added.
